title: His Rules
description: Time OutVal and Chaz broke up after Chaz safeworded unnecessarily during a scene. Can they find a way to come back together?Strict ConsequencesOne proposition, one night. Could it be the beginning of a forever after for a Master and sub?Tagging MackenzieAchieving a Dom’s undivided attention can have unpredictable consequences.Bad IdeaBad ideas can sometimes be the best!SafewordA dangerous game turns into unexpected pleasure…Earning his LeathersCall him old-fashioned, but Connor believes a Dom should earn his leathers.
author: Morticia Knight
